TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs Inherits InputEventArgs
public ref class ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::Input::InputEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用指定 inertial 行為操作的物件。You can use the object to specify the inertial behavior of a manipulation. 使用個別指定每一種操作的 inertial 行為， ，和屬性。You can specify the inertial behavior for each type of manipulation separately by using the , , and properties. 每個屬性都將類型的物件，代表 inertial 行為，並且每個案例中，您可以指定下列項目：Each property is a type of object that represents the inertial behavior and in each case, you can specify the following: - 慣性開始時的初始速度。The initial velocity of the inertia when it begins. - 當慣性結束時的操作所需的位置。The desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends. - 慣性所需減速情形。The desired deceleration of the inertia. 此外，您通常會指定的操作，當慣性結束時所要的位置，或是所需的減速慣性，但非兩者。You typically specify either the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends or the desired deceleration of the inertia, but not both. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例所示事件處理常式，並設定所需的減速的轉譯、 擴充，以及使用慣性期間的旋轉。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationinertiastarting)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationinertiastarting)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Cancel() cil managed

span.span: Cancels the manipulation.

returns.span: 如果成功取消操作，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the manipulation was successfully canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法成功，預設值先前傳送觸控事件做為下、 滑鼠移動滑鼠或滑鼠向上事件的項目，而且未來的操作事件不發生。If the method succeeds, the default sends previous touch events as mouse down, mouse move, or mouse up events to the element and future manipulation events do not occur.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ ExpansionBehavior { System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定展開慣性移動變慢的速率。

span.span: Get or sets the rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement.

value.span: 展開慣性移動變慢的速率。

span.span: The rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來執行下列動作：Use the property to do the following: - 藉由設定開始時指定慣性的初始速度屬性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 慣性結束藉由設定時，指定所需的擴充操作的屬性。Specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 設定指定慣性所需的減速屬性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 您通常將或，但非兩者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

value.span: 在慣性開始之前操作發生變更的速率。

span.span: The rates of changes to the manipulation that occur before inertia starts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Point ManipulationOrigin { System::Windows::Point get(); void set(System::Windows::Point value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定操作起源的點。

span.span: Gets or sets the point from which the manipulation originated.
The point from which the manipulation originated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果一個以上的連絡點起始操作屬性是所有的連絡點之間的點。If more than one point of contact initiated the manipulation, the property is the point between all of the points of contact. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Input::InertiaRotationBehavior ^ RotationBehavior { System::Windows::Input::InertiaRotationBehavior ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::InertiaRotationBehavior ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the rate of slowdown of rotational inertial movement.

value.span: 旋轉慣性移動變慢的速率。

span.span: The rate of slowdown of rotational inertial movement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來執行下列動作：Use the property to do the following: - 藉由設定開始時指定慣性的初始速度屬性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 當慣性結束藉由設定時指定之操作所需的旋轉屬性。Specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 設定指定慣性所需的減速屬性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 您通常將或，但非兩者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

span.span: Specifies the behavior of a manipulation during inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不需要呼叫這個方法。You typically do not need to call this method. 使用屬性改為。Use the properties on the instead.

span.span: The rate of slowdown of linear inertial movement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來執行下列動作：Use the property to do the following: - 藉由設定開始時指定慣性的初始速度屬性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 慣性結束藉由設定時，指定所要的位置操作的屬性。Specify the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 設定指定慣性所需的減速屬性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 您通常將或，但非兩者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
